cnd5:9.2: paññapesi → paññapehi (s1-3) | paññāpesi (mr), uttānīkarosi → uttānīkarohi (s1-3) | uttāniṃ karosi (mr)

cnd5:16.8: pañcasu kāmaguṇesu vā cittassa → pañcasuvā kāmagunesuvā cittassa (bj) | pañcasu kāmaguṇesu cittassa (s1) | pañcasu vā kāmaguṇesu cittassa (s2, s3), vosaggo → vossaggo (bahūsu), anaṭṭhitakiriyatā → anaṭṭhitatā (s1-3) | aniṭṭhitakiriyatā (mr)
cnd5:17.2: nandī → nandi (bj, s1-3, pts1), paligedho → paḷigedho (bj), suttaṃ visaṭā → sottaṃ visatā (s1-3) | sattā visatā (pts1), santhavo → sandhavo (mr), āsīsanā → āsiṃsanā (bj, s1-3, pts1), sādhukamyatā → sādukamyatā (bj) | asādhukammatā (pts1)
cnd5:18.2: gabbhaṭṭhitimūlakaṃ → gabbheṭhitimūlakaṃ (s1-3, mr), ḍāho → ḍaho (bj, s1-3), rakhasā → rakkhasā (mr), lohitapittaṃ → lohitaṃ pittaṃ (s1-3, pts1)
cnd5:28.1: vibhajitāni → vibhattāni (mr), seyyathidaṃ → seyyathīdaṃ (bj, s1-3, pts1)
cnd5:40.3: yācasi → āyācasi (bj, s2, s3) | ayācasi (s1), ajjhesasi → ajjhesi (pts1, mr)

cnd5:49.3: Khuddako → khuddakopi (bj, s1-3, pts1), mahanto → mahantopi (bj, s1-3, pts1)

cnd5:59.5: palibundheyya → paḷibuddheyya (bj) | palibujjheyya (s1-3), anajjhosanno → anajjhāpanno (bj, c1) | anajjhopanno (s1-3)
